mapper.select: SELECT ingredient_avg_id AS ingredientAvgId, ingredient_id AS ingredientId, ingredient_avg_date AS ingredientAvgDate, ingredient_avg_previous_price AS ingredientAvgPreviousPrice, ingredient_avg_price AS ingredientAvgPrice, ingredient_avg_predict_price AS ingredientAvgPredictPrice FROM ingredient_avg WHERE ingredient_id = #{ingredientId} AND ingredient_avg_date=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK), "%y-%c-%e")

SELECT CASE WHEN ingredient_avg_price - ingredient_avg_previous_price IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ingredient_avg_price - ingredient_avg_previous_price END FROM ingredient_avg WHERE ingredient_id = 1 AND ingredient_avg_date=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK), "%y-%c-%e")
SELECT ingredient_avg_price FROM ingredient_avg WHERE ingredient_id = #{ingredientId} AND ingredient_avg_date=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK), "%y-%c-%e")
